name: When the Light turns OFF
description:
No one may know what's hiding in the darkness.

This is a survival-horror game. This means you will have to survival all
the night among unknown creatures and hope that someone will bring you
out of that hell (no one says they will...)

This game does not focus on the graphics but on the environment, the
atmosphere, the story and the sounds. So don't expect a graphic experience,
but an immersive mental one.

**warning**
